text: 🇺🇦 Ukraine's energy sector has come a long way in 10 years, despite the ongoing war. 💪🏽💡Russia's threats haven't stopped, but Ukraine's made progress in strengthening energy security & adopting European standards. 🇷🇺👊🏽Transparent markets, no household subsidies, and less state involvement are key achievements. 📈💰🔌Ukraine's energy sector is now more financially sustainable, but there's still work to be done. 💪🏽🚀Let's keep supporting Ukraine's energy independence! 💪🏽🇺🇦
